title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button and label are not staying on the same line as the view is resized smaller, which is causing usability problems.
OB: When the view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items are moving below the label.
EB: The close button and label should stay on the same line as the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application
2. Open the Navigator view
3. Resize the view to make it smaller
4. Observe that the close button and label move below the label.
